text: Jeanne d'Arc Girubuntu (born 6 May 1995) is a female road cyclist from Rwanda. She became Rwandan national road race and time trial champion in 2014. In 2015, she was invited to train at the World Cycling Centre in Switzerland for three months. She is the first Rwandan female rider to do so, and the thousandth rider to train at the WCC. ==References== ==External links== * profile at Procyclingstats.com Category:1995 births Category:Rwandan female cyclists Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Jeanne d'Arc Girubuntu
